title: Principal Software Engineer (SRE Architect)
description:
Principal Architect over SRE Squad (3 Scrum Teams) for Wellsky Home Health and Hospice Product lines. Focus on Azure DevOps, On-prem deployments, Ansible, Artifactory, NewRelic Monitoring (from Sumo). Pivot to Focus on GCP migration (On-prem/AWS).
  • March 2022 - Oct 2022: Interim Software Director/Delivery Manager over Feature Squad (3 Scrum Team; US, India, and Argentina) (in addition to Architect role)
  • March - Wellsky Home Culture Award for High Performance
  • Handled high priority Subpoena(s) (Grand Jury request(s))
  • Point person on full GCP Migration for one BU, key resource for another
  • Part of Diversity and Inclusion working group (DEI)
  • Point on SkyDev Studio (Learning Series) for DevOps and TechTalks (two different Studio series)
  • Presented 15m Lighting Talk (mgmt; PunchUp, LiftDown) and 2 Hour Azure DevOps Workshop at DevDays 2023 internal conference
  • Help Azure-based BUs with updates (e.g. AKS)
Recently added in Personal Care unit, Datadog Monitor, Ansible AWX configurations.
